Class Sale

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.thibaulthelsmoortel.helsmoortelUtil.util.economy.Sale

  • public class Sale
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for representation of sales.
    Author:
    Thibault Helsmoortel

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  Sale.SaleAlreadyCompletedException
      Inner class used to throw Exceptions when the sale has already been completed.
